shapecode_2_border_a=0.500
shape_2_per_frame1=i=instance;
shape_2_per_frame2=
shape_2_per_frame3=/// circles
shape_2_per_frame4=
shape_2_per_frame5=x= .5+ q1*gmegabuf(10000+3*i)/q6;
shape_2_per_frame6=y= .5+ q1*gmegabuf(10001+3*i);
shape_2_per_frame7=rad=2*q1*gmegabuf(10002+3*i);
shape_2_per_frame8=
shape_2_per_frame9=border_b=.5+.5*sin(.2*i);
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=12
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=1
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=400
shapecode_3_x=0.300
shapecode_3_y=0.800
shapecode_3_rad=0.07100
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.85319
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=0.000

shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=0.100
shapecode_3_border_g=0.300
shapecode_3_border_b=0.700
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=
shape_3_per_frame2=//// intersection points
shape_3_per_frame3=
shape_3_per_frame4=i=instance;   
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=x= .5+ q1*gmegabuf(3*i)/q6;
shape_3_per_frame7=y= .5+ q1*gmegabuf(3*i+1);
shape_3_per_frame8=
shape_3_per_frame9=a=gmegabuf(3*i+2);   a2=a;
shape_3_per_frame10=
shape_3_per_frame11=rad=rad*q1;
shape_3_per_frame12=
shape_3_per_frame13=b=.5+.5*sin(.1*i);   g=1;       r=1;
shape_3_per_frame14=r2=.3*r;             g2=.3*g;   b2=.3*b;
per_frame_init_1=i=0; loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;  i=i+1;);
per_frame_1=warp=0;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=zoom=1;
per_frame_4=decay=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_7=q1=.3+.15*sin(.2*time);        //// zoom
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=///// 2 circles intersection (n x n times) /////
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=ind=0;  i1=0;  loop(20, 
per_frame_13=xa=sin(.3*time+.314*i1);    ya=cos(.3*time+.314*i1);                               /// circle A position
per_frame_14=ra=abs(10*sin(-.2*time+.314*i1))*q1;                                               /// circle A radius
per_frame_15=gmegabuf(10000+3*i1)=xa;   gmegabuf(10001+3*i1)=ya;   gmegabuf(10002+3*i1)=ra;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=i2=0;  loop(20,
per_frame_18=xb=sin(.3*time+.314*i2);    yb=cos(.3*time+.314*i2);                               /// circle B position
per_frame_19=rb=abs(10*sin(-.2*time+.314*i2))*q1;                                               /// circle B radius
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=d=sqrt(sqr(xa-xb)+sqr(ya-yb));     p=(ra*ra-rb*rb+d*d)/(2*d); 
per_frame_22=h=sqrt(ra*ra-p*p);                 c=pow(-1,instance);
per_frame_23=x=xa+p*(xb-xa)/d;                  y=ya+p*(yb-ya)/d;
per_frame_24=x=x-c*h*(yb-ya)/d;                 y=y+c*h*(xb-xa)/d;               /// intersection points
per_frame_25=a=if(above(d,ra+rb),0,1);                                           /// hide when one circle is outside other
per_frame_26=a=if(below(d,abs(ra-rb)),0,a);                                      /// hide when one circle is inside other
per_frame_27=a=if(equal(d,0),0,a);                                               /// hide when circles have the same center
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=
per_frame_30=gmegabuf(3*ind)=x;      gmegabuf(3*ind+1)=y;   gmegabuf(3*ind+2)=a;
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=ind=ind+1;   i2=i2+1;);    i1=i1+1;);
warp_1=`float2 numerator, denominator, fraction;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{
warp_4=`numerator = float2(q13,q14);
warp_5=`denominator = uv+float2(-q5,q6)-float2(0,1);
warp_6=`fraction = float2( numerator.x*denominator.x + numerator.y*denominator.y,   // the fractions real part
warp_7=`                   numerator.y*denominator.x - numerator.x*denominator.y)/  // the fractions imaginary part
warp_8=`                   (denominator.x*denominator.x + denominator.y*denominator.y);
warp_9=`fraction *=.002;
warp_10=`float2 inv = lerp(0.5+(uv-0.5)*2,fraction+0.5,0.5); //uv vector for the spinal fractal
warp_11=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 2 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_12=`float3 noise = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5;
warp_13=`float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_14=`float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_15=`float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_16=`float2 uv1 = uv + (float2(dx.x, dy.x)*0.4+noise*2)*texsize.zw;
warp_17=`float2 uv2 = float2(dx.y, dy.y)*texsize.zw*6;
warp_18=`float2 uv3 = uv + (float2(dx.z, dy.z)*0.5+noise*2)*texsize.zw ;
warp_19=`ret.x = GetPixel(uv1).x;
warp_20=`ret.z = GetPixel(uv3).z;
warp_21=`ret.y = GetPixel(inv+uv2).y;
warp_22=`ret += noise*0.04-0.0018; // when using an error diffusion dither you can decay to black on a rate below 1 bit
warp_23=`
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_6=`
comp_7=`
comp_8=`float2 my_uv = uv-float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*12*0;
comp_9=`ret = GetBlur2(my_uv).z*(GetBlur2(uv).y)*float3(0.3,0,0.5);
comp_10=`
comp_11=`ret = lerp(ret,3,GetBlur3(uv+float2(dx.z,dy.z)*0.4-float2(dx.y,dy.y)).x*0.5);
comp_12=`
comp_13=`my_uv = uv + float2(dy.y,dx.y)*texsize.zw*32 + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*16;
comp_14=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(1,0.5,0.2),(GetPixel(my_uv)-GetBlur1(my_uv)+GetBlur2(my_uv)).z*(1-GetBlur1(uv).y)*1.1);
comp_15=`
comp_16=`my_uv = uv+float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*6;
comp_17=`ret = lerp(ret,1,(GetPixel(my_uv)-GetBlur1(my_uv)+GetBlur2(my_uv)*0.95).x);
comp_18=`
comp_19=`
comp_20=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_21=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.zxy;
comp_22=`}
